name: Fiery Family
_source: speak;Blazing;Oh, thank you for accompanying me home!
speak;Sal;A pleasure, I'm glad we could work together, Blazing.
speak;Sages;I trust we will meet the Earl?
speak;Ignatius;Ah! Blazing, how is my boy?
speak;Blazing;Very well, father!|I may not have seen the festival, but I managed to meet new friends!
speak;Ignatius;And that would be... You two?|Oh! P-Prince Sages?!
speak;Sal;And I, Sal, his loyal knight.
speak;Ignatius;How rude of me not to introduce myself.|Earl Ignatius Phyron, glad to be acquainted.|I thank you both for my son's safety.
speak;Sal;I assume you've heard of current events...
speak;Ignatius;Indeed, the acts committed were an insult to the Goddess.|Though, I do not believe it to be the work of Arcei.
speak;Sages;I understand being shrewd, after all, Grahment is hardly unified, right?
speak;Ignatius;Exactly, Duke Hogarth von Ilkrest is most vocal in opposition.|While Viscount Zio is in support.
speak;Sal;The Duke didn't go himself?|Is he not the most powerful noble in Grahment?
speak;Ignatius;He had his own business to attend to, so it fell on the Marquess.|Who I don't believe has returned yet...
speak;Sal;Is it possible Aurelia did something to Marquess Cres?
speak;Ignatius;Either way, I am reluctant to take sides as of current.|We haven't much to spare at the moment.|Though given you guided my son home... I trust your morality.
speak;Blazing;Please Father, allow me to travel with them!|I must uncover the truth myself!
speak;Ignatius;I raised a young man, with flickering conviction...|It's almost bringing a tear to my eyes...
speak;Sages;We will protect him with our lives, trust us.
speak;Ignatius;I cannot allow you to leave empty handed.|Since Blazing is your companion now, this is for you, son.
speak;Ignatius;Sadly not.|I'm afraid your old man hasn't given up yet.|I'll need it to defend our realm, should worse come to us.
speak;Blazing;Aww... But, I understand.|I will become responsible enough for it, one day.
speak;Sages;Thank you, Earl Phyron, for your kind-of support.

speak;Ignatius;Of course, I know the ramifications of my son aiding you...|So be it, I trust my family, always.|I bid you safe travels.|You might need it, with how those bloodhound Monsdorians operate.
